text: @realDonaldTrump @MikeGarcia2020 @GavinNewsom @GavinNewsom is busy trying to trying to safely open his state from a virus you failed to contain. Meanwhile, in my state of NY, 216 died in the last 24 hours from the coronavirus. You are a blithering idiot and a moron.
